name: Dice Descent
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme Roll of the Dice.

Stuck in a seemingly never ending dungeon with an all powerful die that decides your fate, how long can you last before your luck rolls out.

The Dice

With the roll of a dice many variables are chosen:

  • Player Class
  • Enemy Spawned
  • Stages per floor
  • Level of attack
  • Level of healing
  • Skill success
Credits

All code, assets, and sound effects made by me.
